entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump FACTS:
Under Obama:
H1N1 outbreak 2009 to 2010: 12,469 deaths in US.
EBOLA outbreak 2014-2016: Only 2 deaths on US soil.

Under Trump:
Coronavirus outbreak 2020: Over 52,000 Americans dead and counting plus U.S. economy has collapsed

Bottom Line: Presidential Leadership matters.
